name: Descontrol (Sarfol)
description:
Descontrol is a 2D Platformer game in wich you can't control de main character and instead you  have to create the necesary platforms to allow it to reach the goal. This game was created during the GMTK Jam 2020 (Out of Control). This was my first time working alone in a game jam, and it shows (Crappy art and no audio, and only 8 levels), but overall was a good experience.

HOW TO PLAY
  • Spacebar or the Play/Stop button in the upper right corner to make the robot perform it actions and reset the playback
  • The reset button clears all the platforms
  • Left Click to create a platform
  • Right Click to remove a platform
  • Escape to quit game
